title: Flaky roi_align_op_gpu_test
body_html:
Flaky test on CI:

https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/caffe2-builds/job/py2-cuda9.0-cudnn7-ubuntu16.04-test/2412/console

00:01:26.808 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/caffe2/operators/roi_align_op_gpu_test.cc:258: Failure
00:01:26.808 Expected equality of these values:
00:01:26.808   y_cpu_vec[max_diff_idx]
00:01:26.808     Which is: 0.23958379
00:01:26.808   y_gpu_vec[max_diff_idx]
00:01:26.808     Which is: 0.23958361
00:01:27.061 [  FAILED  ] RoiAlignTest.CheckCPUGPUEqual (628 ms)
